医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
加州在酷暑天气下加快室内防热措施加州大部分地区本周气温高达三位数，室内工作的加州人立即获得了免受极端高温影响的保护措施。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240724/California-speeds-up-indoor-heat-protections-amid-sweltering-summer-weather.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240724/California-speeds-up-indoor-heat-protections-amid-sweltering-summer-weather.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a19d5efa-6891-45b1-b063-2b0ff019dceb Wed, 24 Jul 2024 22:31:06 -0400 California speeds up indoor heat protections amid sweltering summer weather
概念验证动物研究表明抗击艾滋病毒的斗争向前迈出了一步乔治梅森大学传染病研究中心 (CIDR) 和杜兰国家灵长类动物研究中心的研究人员在《自然基因疗法》中进行了一项突破性的概念验证研究，发现了一种类似 HIV 的病毒颗粒，可以使人不再需要终身服药。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240724/Proof-of-concept-animal-studies-demonstrate-a-step-forward-in-the-fight-against-HIV.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240724/Proof-of-concept-animal-studies-demonstrate-a-step-forward-in-the-fight-against-HIV.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b2c2eff0-2eb0-4d2f-812c-b1eb8d126931 Wed, 24 Jul 2024 21:48:21 -0400 Proof-of-concept animal studies demonstrate a step forward in the fight against HIV
研究显示，老年人对减少处方表现出兴趣超过 82% 的 50 至 80 岁美国人服用一种或多种处方药，其中 80% 的人表示，如果他们的医疗保健提供者批准，他们愿意停止其中一种或多种药物。密歇根大学的研究表明。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240724/Older-adults-show-interest-in-deprescribing-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240724/Older-adults-show-interest-in-deprescribing-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0044c52d-6f7d-4808-98a7-857d0c2e5ceb Wed, 24 Jul 2024 21:43:00 -0400 Older adults show interest in deprescribing, study reveals
以干细胞为靶标的急性髓系白血病治疗取得突破急性髓性白血病是最致命的癌症之一。导致这种疾病的白血病干细胞对治疗具有高度抵抗力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240724/Breakthrough-in-acute-myeloid-leukemia-treatment-targets-stem-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240724/Breakthrough-in-acute-myeloid-leukemia-treatment-targets-stem-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c1fb283f-2700-496d-91ee-e486765faf04 Wed, 24 Jul 2024 21:37:12 -0400 Breakthrough in acute myeloid leukemia treatment targets stem cells
简单的血液测试可以预测 CAR-T 治疗多发性骨髓瘤的成功威尔康奈尔医学公司的最新研究表明，测量淋巴细胞（体内的一种白细胞）数量的简单血液测试可以预测复发性多发性骨髓瘤患者是否会对 CAR-T 免疫疗法产生良好反应，纽约长老会医院、哥伦比亚大学和西奈山伊坎医学院。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240724/Simple-blood-test-may-predict-CAR-T-therapy-success-in-multiple-myeloma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240724/Simple-blood-test-may-predict-CAR-T-therapy-success-in-multiple-myeloma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ff88c8c0-1ebd-4804-a466-1e9ee8cb5834 Wed, 24 Jul 2024 21:20:51 -0400 Simple blood test may predict CAR-T therapy success in multiple myeloma
神经科学家发现了安慰剂效应谜题的关键部分安慰剂效应非常真实。几十年来，我们已经知道这一点，从现实生活中的观察和研究人员为许多疾病和病症（尤其是疼痛）设计的最佳双盲随机临床试验中可以看出。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240724/Neuroscientists-discover-a-key-piece-of-the-placebo-effect-puzzle.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240724/Neuroscientists-discover-a-key-piece-of-the-placebo-effect-puzzle.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5c45d8a5-41c8-4027-b771-48cc3b66af43 Wed, 24 Jul 2024 21:11:34 -0400 Neuroscientists discover a key piece of the placebo effect puzzle
“基因不当行为”在健康人群中出奇地普遍科学家们发现，“基因不当行为”——基因在预期被关闭时却处于活跃状态——在健康人群中是一种令人惊讶的普遍现象。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240724/Gene-misbehavior-found-to-be-surprisingly-common-among-the-healthy-population.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240724/Gene-misbehavior-found-to-be-surprisingly-common-among-the-healthy-population.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b2e148c7-5b6c-486e-99cd-4ee5528dd683 Wed, 24 Jul 2024 21:07:07 -0400 'Gene misbehavior' found to be surprisingly common among the healthy population
人工智能通过分析染色质图像来改善乳腺癌分期Paul Scherrer 研究所 PSI 和麻省理工学院 MIT 的研究人员正在利用人工智能来改进乳腺癌的分类。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240724/AI-improves-breast-cancer-staging-by-analyzing-chromatin-images.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240724/AI-improves-breast-cancer-staging-by-analyzing-chromatin-images.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9de6e3e2-b71f-44b2-95ff-764fa6ba8abb Wed, 24 Jul 2024 20:58:00 -0400 AI improves breast cancer staging by analyzing chromatin images
CHEST 发布治疗中央气道阻塞的新临床指南美国胸科医师学会 (CHEST) 最近发布了关于中央气道阻塞 (CAO) 的新临床指南。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240724/CHEST-releases-new-clinical-guideline-for-managing-central-airway-obstruction.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240724/CHEST-releases-new-clinical-guideline-for-managing-central-airway-obstruction.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4c7338e1-bf77-476e-beb9-6cc32aaffc54 Wed, 24 Jul 2024 20:54:34 -0400 CHEST releases new clinical guideline for managing central airway obstruction
减少检测差异可以大大降低美国黑人的结肠癌发病率牛津大学出版社发表在《国家癌症研究所杂志》上的一篇新论文发现，消除美国结肠癌检测中的种族差异将显着降低黑人的结肠癌和结肠癌死亡率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240724/Reducing-testing-disparities-could-dramatically-cut-colon-cancer-rates-among-Black-Americans.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240724/Reducing-testing-disparities-could-dramatically-cut-colon-cancer-rates-among-Black-Americans.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f452199f-3ca2-49a3-832e-cae9994fdfb5 Wed, 24 Jul 2024 20:50:37 -0400 Reducing testing disparities could dramatically cut colon cancer rates among Black Americans
